title: Dafi hand and face moisturizing cream

0.title: Dafi lavender hand and face moisturizing cream for normal skin
0.description:
• Softens, restores and reduces inflammation, spots and redness of the skin and destroys acne-causing bacteria.
  • Retaining moisture and helping to produce skin cells, suitable for all skin types
  • Contains niacinamide, vitamin A, provitamin 5B, retinol, lavender extracts and shea butter.

1.title: Dafi avocado hand and face moisturizing cream for dry skin
1.description:
• Protects the skin, prevents dryness, sensitivity, itching and skin irritations
  • Deep moisturizing, nourishing and soothing skin and suitable for dry skin
  • Contains Eucerin, coconut, argan, avocado oils, shea butter and vitamin E

2.title: Dafi aloe vera hand and face moisturizing cream for oily skin
2.description:
• Helping heal sunburn, wounds and acne, building collagen and preventing skin aging
  • Moisturizing, protecting skin color and reducing blemishes, suitable for normal to oily skin
  • Contains hyaluronic acid, Eucerin, vitamin C, aloe vera extract, shea butter and Bisabolol
